page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content: There is only one bus route in the area.It is run by the Midland Red Bus Company.The service is Number 193 and there are 4 a day from Burton on Trent and 5 a day to Burton. On the outward run from{Burton,}the bus arrives at{Walton}at{09.07,12.47 {17.02,18.07.} On the journeys from{Walton}to{Burton it leaves at{07.57,09.37,12.17,15.07 and{17.32.} There are extra services on Saturdays. There is no train service in the area.The main line from Derby to Birmingham passes through the area but the nearest stations are Burton or Lichfield. The main form of transport is private car.
